about_the_game:
This is a simple single-player action-adventure game. The story takes place in a mysterious world filled with strange creatures, ordinary humans, and two nations. More importantly, there is a great demon king who has kidnapped the princess of one of the nations! From this point on, the continent becomes fraught with danger. The protagonist is an ordinary person living in an obscure little village. One day, he decides to go on an adventure to see how vast the world is.

In the game, players can control the protagonist to fight battles. Engaging in combat with monsters and opening treasure chests can yield items. All maps are open for exploration, and there is no linear storyline.

This game was independently developed by a solo game enthusiast in his spare time through self-study. Thank you, everyone!

name: Lets go boy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: intel core i5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: all NVIDIA or all AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A simple yet not-so-simple 2D pixel open-world adventure game
